homePage.statement:
Virginia Tech Digital Library Platform

Welcome to VTDLP. VTDLP is a cloud-native, digital libraries solution supporting preservation and access while taking advantage of the efficiencies of Amazon Web Services.

mediaSection.title: Welcome to the University Libraries at Virginia Tech
mediaSection.text: The University Libraries play an essential role in furthering Virginia Techâ€™s mission as a global land-grant university by providing a diversity of resources to produce, disseminate, use, share and sustain data and information.
